item.title: Why America Isn't Ready For the EV Takeover
item.description: Why America Isn’t Ready For the EV Takeover Despite the growing popularity of electric vehicles (EVs), there are still a number of challenges that are limiting their adoption in America. These challenges include: Software glitches: EV software is still relatively new and can be buggy.
